body.p:
Greenville, Ky., Oct 25, 1860
Govr B. MaGoffin

Dr Sir. It would be a convenience to the legal profession and to business ^men^ of this place to have a notary Public here. B. E. Pittman's term of office, as notary, having expired, we would respectfully recommend John R. Lambuth, of Greenville, to you for the appointment.

Chas Eaves
R. S. Russell
F. B. Hancock
Edward R Weir Jr
W. W. Hancock Jr
M. C Hay
H Bruce
N. G. Jones.
B E Pittman

Muhlenberg
Notary
J. R Lambuth
Comd. Nov 12 1860
